maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: Huh. It's a new kind of virus, I guess?
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Hum. C'est un nouveau type de virus, j'imagine ?

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig:
Wait.\. Wait, wait, wait.\.
That thing is \c[3]Level 60\c[0]?!
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text:
Attends.\. Attends, attends, attends.\.
Ce truc est \c[3]Niveau 60\c[0] ?!

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: Hm...\. Mind hitting this one for me once, Lea?
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Hm...\. Est-ce que tu pourrais frapper celui-là pour moi, Lea ?

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: Well...\. I guess we both should be able to handle it, right?
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Bon...\. Ça ne devrait pas être un problème pour nous deux, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: Better stay on your guard, Lea. I'll try to knock it down as fast as possible.
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Reste sur tes gardes, Lea. Je vais essayer de le dézinguer aussi vite que possible.

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: Huh.\. That wasn't so bad now, was it?
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Hah.\. C'était pas si difficile, hein ?

maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.orig: At least we got that out of the way. Let's go on.
maps/arid/interior/challenge-1-ug.json/e.text: Je suis heureux de m'être débarrassé de ce truc. Continuons.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Japp. Je vois rien du tout.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.note: de: je distingue pas mes mains devant moi

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Somebody mind turning on the light?
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Quelqu'un aurait-il l'aimabilité d'allumer la lumière ?

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Looks like a lobby of sorts.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: On dirait une sorte de salle d'attente.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: It's...\. strangely familiar.\. But I can't quite pinpoint it.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Ça me parait...\. étrangement familier.\. Mais je n'arrive pas à mettre le doigt dessus.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: This is...\. weird.\. It's very weird.
...I don't know.\. Something just feels very weird.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: ... Je ne sais pas.\. Quelque chose me parait très curieux.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: It's probably about time for me to log out.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Il est probablement temps que je me déconnecte.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Huh...\. looks like we spent enough time in the room?
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Hein... ?\. On dirait qu'on a passé suffisamment de temps dans cette pièce ?

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: So what exactly was the point of all this?
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Mais c'était quoi le but exact de tout ça ?

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: I really don't get this place. Let's go.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Je ne la sens pas cette pièce. Allons-nous-en.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Whoa!\. No way!\. That's the lobby of my workplace!
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Quoi !\. C'est pas possible !\. C'est l'accueil de là ou je bosse !

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Did they seriously add a reconstruction of it...\. right here in the Playground?
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Ils en ont vraiment fait une reconstruction...\. ici, directement sur le Terrain de Jeu ?

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Hm...\. looking at it closely, some details seem to be off a bit.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Hum...\. En y regardant de plus près, certains détails ne collent pas vraiment.

maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.orig: Still...\. it was probably enough to trigger a few memories for my Evotar.
maps/arid/interior/lobby.json/entities/3.text: Mais bon...\. c'était probablement suffisant pour rappeler quelques souvenirs à mon Évotar.
